availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Covington, Kenton County, Kentucky, clerk. Kentucky native. Son of William H. Estep and Elizabeth Winston Estep. Resident of Mason County, Kentucky, in 1850. Clerk in Covington, Kentucky in 1860. Served in the 22nd Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment as captain from November 17, 1862, to March 4, 1863. Wounded in Warren County, Mississippi, between December 27 and December 29, 1862. Discharged on account of disability. Clerk in Kenton County in 1863.
